question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Em que margens do rio se situa o centro de Uppsala, na Suécia?
answer: O centro de Uppsala, na Suécia, situa-se nas margens do rio Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the banks of the river Fyrisån.
